Magic axes are monsters that resemble translucent Iron battleaxes. They can be given as a Wilderness Slayer assignment by Krystilia.

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%

    • 2.3 Wilderness Slayer tertiary

    • 3.2 Tertiary
    • 3.3 Catacombs tertiary
  • 4 Changes
  • 5 Trivia

Location Levels Members Spawns Map

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Iron battleaxe1Always44109

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Looting bag11/3[d 1]Not soldN/A
  1. ↑ Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.

Wilderness Slayer tertiary[edit | edit source]

The following drops are only accessible while on a Slayer task given by Krystilia.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Larran's key11/533Not sold54
Slayer's enchantment11/2842,747720

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January –
27 June 2005

The NPC's examine was changed from "A magic axe with a mind of it's[sic] own." to "A magic axe with a mind of its own."

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In Runescape Classic they closely resemble the equipped Iron battleaxe.
